casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the INVOLUNTARY TERMINATION OF the PARENT-CHILD RELATIONSHIP OF: N.C. (Minor Child)
and
T.C. (Father), Appellant-Respondent,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner,
and
Child Advocates, Inc., Guardian Ad Litem. Court of Appeals Case No. 49A02-1712-JT-2846 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed May 29, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

ROBB , J.

Affirmed.

NAJAM, J., Concurs.

ALTICE, J., Concurs.
